parameter.name: contour_grid_value_min
parameter.documentation: The minimum value for which grid point values are to be plotted

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_max
parameter.documentation: The maximum value for which grid point values are to be plotted

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_lat_frequency
parameter.documentation: The grid point values in every Nth latitude row are plotted

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_lon_frequency
parameter.documentation: The grid point values in every Nth longitude column are plotted

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of grid point values (Full choice of colours)

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_format
parameter.documentation: Format of grid point values (MAGICS Format/(AUTOMATIC))
parameter.release: Format is not yet implemented. Expected Magics++0.3

parameter.name: contour_grid_value_quality
parameter.release: Quality is not yet implemented. Expected Magics++0.3
